attributes.action: Change The London 2012 Olympic Logo To Something Half Decent
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Olympic logo is a shambles. It is a complete tradegy, or is it some sort of parody? It's a waste of four hundred thousand pounds of tax payers money. Talk about laughing in my face. As a British citizen and a tax payer I condemn this convulsive hideous graffiti-like nonsense. I was going to compare it to other commercial nightmares but can't under the terms and conditions.

I've never heard of a place called Iondon? It should be London, right? The numbers 2012 I only noticed a day after having read an article on how bad it was...

The designers shouldn't just be ashamed, the organisers should get a rebate.. I could have done a better job for ten thousandth of the money... An even better suggestion would be having our Graphic Designer for our band (The Dirty Rich) doing a fantastically better job on the replacement Olympic logo.

Nobody will get used to this logo. In my opinion the new 5th series of a Bavarian car manufacturer's car that many will have heard of was ugly, but this is in a hole new league of ugliness. 

It's supposed to attract young people? It doesn't.. trust me, it is as meaningless to them as it is to us.

CHANGE IT!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
